arts.ttl: Simeone’s first Serie A goal in a year sees Torino upset Roma 1-0
arts.sum: Gasperini’s former team, Atalanta, was playing Lecce later and looking for its first win of the season after opening with two draws. Argentinian forward Giovanni Simeone scored his first Serie A goal in more than a year to help Torino to a surprise 1-0 win at Roma on Sunday.

arts.ttl: AS Roma vs Torino – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: AS Roma and Torino are set to clash in Serie A this weekend, with both teams eager to build momentum. Roma, led by the newly appointed Gian Piero Gasperini, have been flawless so far, notching back-to-back 1-0 wins to open their league account. arts.sum: AS Roma and Torino go head-to-head in Serie A this weekend. Both sides will be looking to continue their early-season journey on a positive note, with the Giallorossi seeking to maintain their perfect start. Torino are searching for their first victory of the campaign. arts.ttl: Roma vs. Torino sunday at 12:30 CEST
arts.sum: The Giallorossi are chasing a third consecutive win after narrow victories over Bologna and Pisa, while Torino are looking for their first three points of the season. For the second consecutive season, Serie A’s first lunchtime kick-off features Roma: last year it was on matchday four at Marassi against Genoa, a 1–1 draw.
